meanings.definition: An official ban on trade or other commercial activity with a particular country.
meanings.sent1: The embargo on trade with that country hurt our economy.
meanings.sent2: The government imposed an embargo on imports from the nation.
meanings.sent3: The embargo on chocolate made everyone crave it more.
meanings.sent4: The embargo on communication left us feeling isolated.
meanings.sent5: The embargo on sugar made the price skyrocket.

meanings.definition: An official ban on a particular activity.
meanings.sent1: The embargo on fishing in the lake was necessary for conservation.
meanings.sent2: The company faced an embargo on using certain materials in their products.
meanings.sent3: The embargo on using phones during class led to better focus.
meanings.sent4: The embargo on overtime work improved employee well-being.
meanings.sent5: The embargo on sugary snacks helped people eat healthier.
